# Hist√≥rico de comandos


Criando o projeto
=================

```
    jekyll new meu-blog
    cd !$
    bundle init
    bundle install
    bundle add jekyll
    bundle exec jekyll serve
```



Gerando indice
==============


Instalando o comando *doctoc*:

```
    npm install -g doctoc
```


Usando o comando:
```
    doctoc 2019-11-21-image-processing-for-vision-and-graphics.markdown
```
